fields.name: cropHeight
fields.description: Height of the crop rectangle in pixels.

fields.name: cropWidth
fields.description: Width of the crop rectangle in pixels.

fields.name: cropX
fields.description: X position of the crop rectangle from the left edge of the image in pixels. Top left is position (0,0).

fields.name: cropY
fields.description: Y position of the crop rectangle from the top edge of the image in pixels. Top left is position (0,0).

fields.name: fileId
fields.description: ID of an existing file. The key prefix must be 069, and the file size must be less than 8 MB. Note Images uploaded on the Group page and on the User page don’t have file IDs and therefore can’t be used.

fields.name: versionNumber
fields.description: Version number of an existing file. If not provided, the latest version is used.
